name: Taco
description:
Taco is an adventure game where you take the role of Taco, a dog who's trying to get home. Use Taco's smelling and hearing abilities to solve puzzling situations and make your way back home!

Created by team Ohana in under 48 hours during the Global Game Jam 2019. Complete information here.

How to play:

  • Move Taco with the arrow keys or WASD. Use the spacebar to interact with objects and people.
  • Taco's sense of smell is shown in the lower-left corner of the screen: bigger objects are closer to Taco, and smaller objects are farther.
  • Roads are very dangerous! To cross a road, listen to cars coming. Cross quickly as soon as you don't hear any cars! (It's more difficult to cross in intersections as you'll hear cars from every direction)
  • To win the game, get Taco back to his home.
